snippet.title: Day Zero Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Can you survive a zombie apocalypse? Day Zero is a text-based survival game where choices determine fate and ethical and moral decisions matter. Every choice shapes the story. Are you ready to test your limits in a zombie apocalypse?

Add to wishlist  https://store.steampowered.com/app/3441130/Day_Zero/?
